question: Which of the following are the members of the electoral college electing the president?
option2: Elected members of Rajya Sabha & Lok Sabha
option3: Elected members of the Rajya Sabha , Lok Sabha and State Assemblies
option4: Elected members of Rajya Sabha, Lok Sabha , state assemblies and assemblies of Union Territories
answer: Elected members of the Rajya Sabha , Lok Sabha and State Assemblies
explanation: The President is indirectly elected by means of an electoral college which consist of the elected members of both the houses of parliament and the Legislative assemblies of the States of India and the Union territories of Delhi, and Puducherry.
